subject: Basketball
Lockouts
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: N.B.A. players and others discussed the league’s final proposal to the players union on Twitter and elsewhere on Friday, but much of what was said painted an inaccurate picture.
snippet: N.B.A. players and others discussed the league’s final proposal to the players union on Twitter and elsewhere on Friday, but much of what was said painted an inaccurate picture.
